# selector-root-no-composition

Disallow the composition of:root selectors.

    a, :root {}
/** ↑  ↑
 * This type of composite selector */

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a, :root {}

:root + a {}

html:root {}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

:root {}
